text.12_Daf, 5_Line: “The day when rain falls is as great as the day when the Torah was given, as it is said [in Deuteronomy 32:2], ‘Let my teaching drop as the rain.’ When Moses said “teaching,” he meant Torah, as it is said of the Torah [in Proverbs 4:2] ‘For I give you sound teaching; do not abandon my Torah.’”
text.12_Daf, 42_Line: ...I have learned a lot from my teachers, and even more. from my friends. But from my students I have learned the most
text.12_Daf, 65_Line: It is as the daughter of Caesar said to Rabbi Yehoshua ben Channinah,...
